messages.title: Why I'm backing CLIFF WATERMAN
messages.content: I've known Cliff for many years and I know he'll do a good job for us. I'll definitely be voting Labour because I believe in Labour values and I'm certain that Cliff is the one who will represent them. Ian Cullen, Southgate Ward, Bury St Edmunds

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We'll end fuel poverty and ensure warm homes for all. We'll create 450,000 good new energy jobs and make Britain carbon neutral by 2030. Only a Labour government will tackle the climate crisis.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: BREATHING NEW LIFE INTO PUBLIC SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government will repair our run-down NHS. We'll sort out the chaos in our transport system. We'll invest in our struggling education system. And we'll resolve the worst housing crisis in generations.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AN ECONOMY THAT WORKS FOR EVERYONE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: End in-work poverty within the first term of office and stop unfair zero-hour contracts. Labour will revitalise our economy by putting people before privilege.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: FREE SOCIAL CARE FOR THE ELDERLY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Education should be free for all

issues.economy: End in-work poverty within the first term of office and stop unfair zero-hour contracts. Labour will revitalise our economy by putting people before privilege.
issues.education: SCRAP TUITION FEES: Education should be free for all
issues.environment: LABOUR'S GREEN NEW DEAL: Ban fracking - for good!
issues.health: A Labour government will repair our run-down NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: End in-work poverty within the first term of office and stop unfair zero-hour contracts.
issues.transport: We'll sort out the chaos in our transport system.
issues.socialWelfare: FREE SOCIAL CARE FOR THE ELDERLY: With a National Care Service

community.content: We'll resolve the worst housing crisis in generations.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Suffolk for 34 years, mostly in Bury St Edmunds. I was brought up in a working-class family with strong values of hard work, respect and decency and have brought up my children and grandchildren to share these values. I am not a career politician but a democrat who believes that democratic decisions should be respected, even when uncomfortable.

contactInformation.address: 20 Westbury Avenue, Bury St Edmunds, IP33 3RJ

endorsements.endorsement: I've known Cliff for many years and I know he'll do a good job for us. I'll definitely be voting Labour because I believe in Labour values and I'm certain that Cliff is the one who will represent them.

quotes.text: This is a once in a generation chance to transform our country. I am part of our community and I want to represent you in Parliament
